name: Smoke Free Life Coalition
goal: The current ultimate goal of the Coalition is for a working package of legislative changes introducing a comprehensive TAPS to be submitted in the parliament and to create  favourable conditions that would secure a safer passage of the amendments. Experience so far has shown that key factors in reaching this goal would be a strong political and public support that would boost the idea of a comprehensive TAPS ban.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Public Health, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
- We are currently following the development of Implementing Regulation on a Traceability System for Tobacco Products and the Delegated Regulation on Data Storage Contracts and Implementing Decision on Security Features

- Tobacco products taxation
